text: 14:15 Ua Me Ini 20:11; Onger Akaba 33:6; 146:6; Aposel 10:26; 1 Korin 8:4; 1 Tesalonika 1:9; Jems 5:17“Maia! Gumazamiziba, ia tizim bagha arazir kam gami? Ga pura gumazir kɨnimning, egha uaghan ian mɨrara gari. Ga kamaghsua Akar Aghuir kam ia mɨgei. Ia pura bizir kɨnir kabar ziaba fan markɨ. Ia uari isɨ Ekiam danɨng, an Angamɨra Itir God. A Godɨn overiam ko nguazim ko ongarimɨn ingarizim, egha dar itir biziba bar adar ingari.
